Links

Helpful hints for the clueless or curious:

  • J. Arthur's Cookbook. This is a helpful guide to living at MIT and specifically at Random Hall, given to freshmen at the beginning of the year.
  • Laundry Server. The center for all your laundry needs. It spins! It dries! It tells you the status of the laundry! The time savings are mind-boggling.
Website content is under MIT license and hosted on Github. Contact us at ask-jarthur@mit.edu.
